document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the tiger beetles (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Cicindelinae) of Vietnam. 135. Contribution towards the knowledge of Cicindelinae

subSubSection.paragraph: Published data. NORTHEAST: Lang Son ( Mont Mau Son ), Lao Cai ( Horn 1902: 66 ; 1913: 362 ).

Distribution. Vietnam ( Bac Giang , Bac Kan , Gia Lai , Ha Noi City, Hai Phong City, Lang Son , Lao Cai , Thai Nguyen , Thua Thien-Hue , Tuyen Quang , Vinh Phuc ), China ( Fujian , Guangdong , Guangxi , Hainan , Hong Kong , Yunnan), Laos ( Borikhamxay , Champasack , Khammuane ), Cambodia .
Remarks. New provincial records for Bac Giang , Bac Kan , Gia Lai , Ha Noi City, Hai Phong City, Thai Nguyen , Thua Thien-Hue , Tuyen Quang , and Vinh Phuc .
